doc:
Robert Schwartzman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Schwartzman 0 Robert Carmine Schwartzman (born December 24, 1982) is an American actor, screenwriter, director, and musician. Schwartzman is also best known as the lead vocalist of the rock/pop band Rooney. He has also acted in the short black-and-white film Lick the Star and The Virgin Suicides, both directed and co-written by his cousin Sofia Coppola, as well as The Princess Diaries. Robert_Carmine_Schwartzman ( born December_24 , 1982 ) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , director , and musician . Schwartzman is_also_best_known as the_lead_vocalist of the_rock/pop_band_Rooney . He has_also_acted in the_short_black-and-white_film Lick the_Star and The_Virgin_Suicides , both_directed_and co-written by his_cousin_Sofia_Coppola , as_well_as The_Princess_Diaries .
